briefTitle: Successful Microsurgical Breast Reconstruction in Minimally Invasive Mastectomy
officialTitle: Six Steps for a Successful Aesthetic Free Flap Reconstruction Shaping After Minimally Invasive Mastectomy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients who received nipple sparing mastectomy and breast reconstruction from November 2018 to July 2022 from a single breast reconstruction surgeon.

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients failed to be examined for outcome evaluation will be excluded from the study.
